Class YahtzeePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • YahtzeePlayer

  • public class YahtzeePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a Yahtzee player, whose member fields are the player's hand (an ArrayList of YahtzeeDie), the player's scorecard (a series of ScoreLines as well as tallying fields), and a temporary scorecard the displays possible scoring to the user at the end of each turn. This class also has the DICE_IN_PLAY field for the time being, which will probably be passed up to a higher class down the road. yo CPSC 224 Assignment #1 No sources to cite, other than the starter files provided by Dr. Worobec, specifically for this assignment.
    See Also:
    YahtzeeDie, ScoreCard

      this function returns the count of the die value occurring most in the hand but not the value itself

      this function returns the length of the longest straight found in a hand, hand must be sorted beforehand

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • rollingPhase

        public void rollingPhase()
        This function basically implements the rolling part of the players turn. It allows player to keep dice by typing in a string of 'y' and 'n's. Displays the hand after each roll.

      • determine_possibleScores

        public void determine_possibleScores()
        This is called after each turn of rolling to determine for the player on which lines they can score and how much they will score on that line. Uses other functions in this class to determine if the hand meets the criteria for a straight, full house, yahtzee, etc

      • sortAndDisplayHand

        public void sortAndDisplayHand()
        Takes the hand and orders the YahtzeeDie's based on their sideUp values. Is needed to determine if a straight is acheived.

      • displayHand

        public void displayHand()
        Displays the sideUp values of the hand across the screen horizontally

      • maxOfAKindFound

        public int maxOfAKindFound()
        this function returns the count of the die value occurring most in the hand but not the value itself
        Returns:
        the highest number of a single YahtzeeDie value in the hand

      • maxStraightFound

        public int maxStraightFound()
        this function returns the length of the longest straight found in a hand, hand must be sorted beforehand
        Returns:
        the highest straight found in the hand

      • fullHouseFound

        public boolean fullHouseFound()
        this function returns true if the hand is a full house or false if it does not
        Returns:
        whether a full house was found or not
